nodes.text: You stand before a towering stone gateway covered in glowing runes. The air hums with energy. A mossy path leads north into a dark forest. To the east, you see a faint light flickering.

options.text: Head north into the dark forest
Go east toward the flickering light

nodes.text: Ancient trees stretch endlessly above you, their canopy blocking most of the light. Strange whispers echo between the trunks. A narrow trail goes deeper north, and the gateway is to the south.

options.text: Continue deeper north
Return to the gateway

nodes.text: A small campfire crackles in a sheltered alcove. A mysterious figure in a cloak sits nearby, warming their hands. They glance up as you approach.

options.text: Speak to the cloaked figure
Search the alcove quietly
Return to the gateway

nodes.text: You emerge into a moonlit clearing. In the center stands a crumbling tower with a heavy iron door. A crystal pedestal sits nearby, empty. A cave entrance is visible to the east.

options.text: Try the iron door
Explore the cave to the east
Head back south through the forest

nodes.text: The figure speaks in a raspy voice: "Ah, a traveler. The tower to the north holds great secrets... but only for those who carry the right key. I found this rusty old thing nearby — take it, if you wish." They hold out a rusty key.

options.text: Take the rusty key
Decline and head back to the gateway

nodes.text: You creep around the edges of the alcove. Behind a loose rock, you find a rusty key hidden in the dirt. The cloaked figure doesn't seem to notice.

options.text: Pocket the key and head to the gateway
Pocket the key and speak to the figure

nodes.text: The iron door is locked tight. Runes around the frame glow faintly, as if waiting for something. You'll need a key to get through.

options.text: Explore the cave to the east
Head back south through the forest

nodes.text: A damp cave illuminated by bioluminescent mushrooms. Water drips from stalactites. Something glimmers in a shallow pool at the back — it's a glowing crystal!

options.text: Take the glowing crystal
Leave the crystal and go back to the clearing

nodes.text: You take the rusty key. It's cold and heavy in your hand. The cloaked figure nods knowingly. "The tower awaits, traveler."

options.text: Head to the gateway and go north
Thank the figure and explore further east

nodes.text: You slip the rusty key into your pocket and make your way back to the stone gateway. The runes seem to pulse a little brighter now.

options.text: Head north into the forest
Go east to the campfire

nodes.text: You reach into the pool and grasp the crystal. It pulses with warm light, and the mushrooms around you glow brighter in response. This feels important.

options.text: Return to the clearing

nodes.text: Back in the clearing, the crystal pedestal begins to hum as you approach. The glowing crystal in your hand resonates with it. Do you have a key for that iron door?

options.text: Try the iron door with the rusty key
Place the crystal on the pedestal
Head back south through the forest

nodes.text: You insert the rusty key into the lock. With a grinding screech, the iron door swings open, revealing a spiraling staircase inside the tower. Ancient dust swirls in the moonlight.

options.text: Climb the stairs

nodes.text: You place the crystal on the pedestal. It locks into place with a satisfying click, and beams of light shoot outward, illuminating hidden runes on the tower walls. Beautiful, but the door is still locked.

options.text: Try the iron door with the rusty key
Head back to find a key

nodes.text: Inside the tower, spiraling stairs lead up to a single room. Bookshelves line the walls, filled with ancient tomes. A grand window overlooks the entire land. On a desk sits a note that reads: "Congratulations, adventurer. You've found the secret of the tower. The real treasure was the journey itself... and this portfolio website."
